document.full_text: the u.s. olympic committee paid another $163,000 to stephanie streeter in 2010 even though she had effectively stepped down as the organization's ceo in october of the previous year.
document.title: former ceos take in another $280,000 in 2010
lines_and_colors: the u.s. olympic committee paid another $163,000 to stephanie streeter in 2010 even though she had effectively stepped down as the organization's ceo in october of the previous year.
